summary: This is an email from Allison Stoddart to Arian Sahni regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, containing Zoom meeting details for a meeting hosted by Thom, with a focus on privacy and data protection while working remotely.

keyFacts: The email references the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
Zoom meeting details (Meeting ID: 3127323168) are provided, indicating remote coordination on the case.
The email emphasizes privacy and data protection for remote work, suggesting sensitive case discussions.
